alert.note: Alert for Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 9:36PM EST until December 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches. Locally higher amounts closer to 4 inches possible in the stronger lake effect snow bands. Northwest winds gusting as high as 35 mph decreasing to 25 mph overnight. * WHERE...In Indiana, Elkhart and Eastern St. Joseph IN Counties. In Michigan, Cass MI, Northern Berrien and Southern Berrien Counties. The greatest additional snow accumulation is expected across Cass County Michigan and northern Elkhart County Indiana. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could reduce visibility. While snow is expected to diminish by the Tuesday morning commute, roads may still be slick.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
